Uses of Class
payment.Payment

  • Packages that use Payment 
    Package Description
    payment  

    • Uses of Payment in payment

      Fields in payment with type parameters of type Payment 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.List<Payment> PaymentController.paymentList
      Stores the list of all payment objects created by calling the retrievePaymentList() method
      Methods in payment that return Payment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Payment PaymentController.getPaymentByPaymentId(java.lang.String paymentId)
      Search by payment id only returns one payment object as payment id is a primary key
      Methods in payment that return types with arguments of type Payment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Payment> PaymentController.retrievePaymentList() 
      Methods in payment with parameters of type Payment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void PaymentController.printBillInvoice(Payment payment)
      This method prints the bill invoice for that payment object
      static boolean PaymentController.removePayment(Payment payment)
      This method basically remove that particular payment that is being passed into the parameter from the payment list and data file
      static boolean PaymentController.updatePaymentList(Payment payment)
      This method basically create or update the particular Payment object that is being passed into the parameter It checks if the payment object exist or not, if exists, it is being override (updated) else it creates the payment into the data file payment list is being updated accordingly
